Package org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.api.notify

SAL Notification functionality

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NotificationListener
    Notification listener for SAL notifications.
    NotificationPublishService
    Notification Publishing Service The simplified process of the notification publishing is following: Provider invokes #sendNotification(CompositeNode) Broker finds NotificationListeners which subscribed for the notification type.
    NotificationService
    NotificationService provides access to the notification functionality of the SAL.
